title: just went against a team with 3 tanks and 4 of the enemy teammates had bought GA
body: it is taking every fibber in my being not to smash my computer you dont know cancer when you have to face knockbacks, stuns, taunts, snares and slows topped off with 3 unkillable tanks with 2 lives...and a zed but he was bad so...

replies.body: You got countered in champ select, next time dont instalock WW just to play him, instead pick something to counter tanks...
Oh shit, I would rip my hair out. What were your teammates playing?
we had a jhin, velcoz, malz and teemo
